IcoFileCapitalized.crowdinContext: This is the friendly name for ICO files.

ZipFileCapitalized.crowdinContext: This is the friendly name for ZIP files.

BitmapFiles.crowdinContext: This is the friendly name for bitmap files.

NoNetworkLocationsInfo: There are no network locations. If you don't use network locations, you can disable the widget.
EditInNotepadDescription: Edit the selected file in Notepad

ShowToolbar.crowdinContext: Setting that controls if the Toolbar is shown in the main view

ShowTabActions: Show tab actions button in the title bar
